channel.title: New home, Hangout, edge pk, and new jad
channel.description:
Ok, well since A moderator locked my last one because it was 'useless' I'll make a new one. And this one will have details.
Ok, my first topic is my new home area here is an image:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/fth5xu.jpg[/img]
I coded the home area ground up. Took about 5 minutes, but it's still in development. :) And remember, when my source is done, I plan to release it.
Ok next is my unfinished Hangout
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2mei3t.jpg[/img]
It's still in coding because for some odd reason it wont let me make it a safe zone so...I need to fix that.
Next is my new edge pk place. Mod Allstar originally coded this...but I added a little bit. so I claim SOME credit. All i did was add a bank booth and pking shop and well of course replace PK box with it. (I personally didn't like the old pkbox. I thought it was time for a little change.)
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/vs2yvs.jpg[/img] **ment to say bank booth Sorry.** Well, those were my Server developments, Tell me if I did good :)
OK, guys I finished the hangout, Sort of, you see, I need to spawn more NPCs, that will help it. Oh, and guys, it would really help if you rep me. I'm not forcing you to, just wishing you would. Thanks,
~~~~Rebirth~~~~
**NOTE: i'm removing the home pic and re-doing it, it advertises my server. For the moparscape staff to see this, please I just want to let you know i'm taking care of it.**

item.title: New home, Hangout, edge pk, and new jad
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

wow, you took my dream home. NOT lol…

i actually looked at that place for home a few times but it was to small.

anyway gj and good luck. i am partly through my server. just adding bits, editing and trying to make new commands for it.

Read full topic
